title: Atom Plugin for Viewing Go Types in Your IDE
author: bdowns328
content: readme.md -types types view adds list all types the currently active file a panel the left the screen. panel is updated each save, has click--navigate functionality.click line (default) sort entries lineclick method group types their method, overriding line numbers.click method, type, declaration navigate that declaration.toggle open/close option-ctrl-o (unless 's something else that, open cmd + shift + p search types toggle)being newly published package, 's bullet-proof yet. you any issues, welcome github issues will fix as soon i . typically following .also keep eye for updates.
